text: Leila Bolukat ( born 25 November 1982) is an Iranian actress. Her works include Yousuf e Payambar (2007), Amaliyate Mahde Koodak (2012) and Aseman Hamishe Abri Nist (2009), as well as Agha Yousef (2009), Zamani Baraye Asheghi (2012) , and As O Pas (2016) ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year !! Film !! Role !! Language !! class="unsortable" | Notes |- | 2008 || Yousuf e Payambar || Nefertiti || Persian || |- | 2012 || Amaliyate Mahde Koodak || || Persian|| |- | 2014 || Hussein Who Said No || || Persian|| |- |} ==Theatre== * 2015 The Chant of Gabriel's Wing, Actor, Andisheh Hall, Director: Mohsen Moeini http://theater.ir/fa/46822|عنوان= نمایش «آواز پر جبرئیل» میزبان هنرمندان می‌شود Boloukat in The Chant of Gabriel's Wing theatre The Chant of Gabriel's Wing is a treatise from Shahab al-Din Yahya ibn Habash Suhrawardi. This play is written by Mohsen Moeini and Adapted from Shahab al- Din Yahya ibn Habash Suhrawardi's book. The producer of this theater is Negin Mirhasani Vahed ==References== ==External links== * Leila Boloukat Official Page on Instagram Category:Iranian actresses Category:Living people Category:1974 births
